channel.title: Investor interest on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Investor interest on FinanClub

item.title: PR
item.description: score:-50 Chances: Permian Resources Corp. has announced the pricing of an underwritten public offering of shares, resulting in total gross proceeds of approximately $5 million. The company has also successfully priced a private placement of senior notes due 2032, indicating strong investor interest in its offerings.
